concat.scalar:
Hi,
welcome to **Globequest** Travels! here i will assist you to decide a location!!!
where do you wanna travel geographically!
I didn't catch that. Select a valid option:

Sure, who doesnt love the culture and weather in the North of India!! you can chose from eminent locations like-
mountains of **Himachal and Kashmir** temples of **Uttrakhand** culture of **Punjab** diversity of **Uttar pradesh** beauty of **Delhi**
below is the link to defining north [link](https://beyondwildplaces.com/north-india-itinerary-one-month/)

sure who does not love the traditions of south and prominent locations like **Kerela,Tamil nadu,andhra,karnataka**
here is the link below about tourism in south] [link](https://www.holidify.com/collections/places-to-visit-in-south-india)

sure, the east of india features the mountains to the coast, resulting in fascinating variations in climate. It is also**the mineral storehouse of India, having the country's largest and richest mines**.
here is the link about tourism in east [east](https://www.holidify.com/collections/places-to-visit-in-east-india)

sure, the Western India**houses a variety of flora and fauna as it is home to the largest desert in India, the Thar Desert and the coastal regions**. This part is home to the most happening place in India, Goa.
here is link about tourism in west [west](https://www.holidify.com/collections/places-to-visit-in-west-india)

i hope you would have found dream location to travel,
**if not please press no** for the info again
I'm sorry, I did not catch that, please restate your response.
lets go through our options again

thanks for visiting **Globequest** travels
i hope you a good trip!!
